application_information.about_this_app: # Dne To-Do Dne To-Do is a simple to-do list app designed for managing tasks. It offers basic features like task creation, completion, and deletion. ## Key Features: - **Task Creation**: Create and manage tasks with ease. - **Task Completion**: Mark tasks as completed. - **Task Deletion**: Delete tasks. For more information or support, visit the [Dne To-Do Help Center](https://help.dne-to-do.io/) or contact Dne To-Do support at [support@dne-to-do.io](mailto:support@dne-to-do.io)
application_information.Required_Os: Android 6.0> or iOS 12.0> or Web Browser
application_information.interactive_elements: Users interact, Shares location, Digital purchases
